Module org.postgresql.pljava.internal
Package org.postgresql.pljava.elog

Class ELogHandler

java.lang.Object
java.util.logging.Handler
org.postgresql.pljava.elog.ELogHandler
public class ELogHandler
extends Handler
Provides access to the loggin mechanism of the PostgreSQL server.
Author:
Thomas Hallgren
